title: AT Kearney's Heinroth: Supply Reserves Will Curtail OPEC(Audio)
itunes:title: AT Kearney's Heinroth: Supply Reserves Will Curtail OPEC(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Sean Heinroth, Principal, Oil & Gas, at global consulting firm A.T. Kearney, on the state of energy markets and why demand for crude will continue to be slow to recover.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
